com.lpoo.game

Interface GameServices

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NullGameServices, PlayServices

    public interface GameServices
    The Game Services used in the Game.

      • isSignedIn

        boolean isSignedIn()
        Returns:
        If the User is signed in return true, false otherwise.

      • submitScore

        void submitScore(int level,
                 int score)
        Submit the scores of the given Level to the Game Services.
        Parameters:
        level - The level that will have his scores updated.
        score - The score to update with.

      • unlockAchievement

        Parameters:

        Gets the scores of the given level and displays them through google's default widget.
